a) 1024 = 0000 0100 0000 0000 = 0400

b) -1024

Positive: 1024 = 0000 0100 0000 0000
Bit flip: 1111 1011 1111 1111
+1      : 1111 1100 0000 0000

So -1024 = fc00

c) -1

Positive: 1 = 0000 0000 0000 0001
Bit flip: 1111 1111 1111 1110
+1      : 1111 1111 1111 1111

So -1 = ffff

d) 32767 = 0111 1111 1111 1111 = 7fff

e) -256

Positive: 256 = 0000 0001 0000 0000
Bit flip: 1111 1110 1111 1111
+1      : 1111 1111 0000 0000

So -256 = ff00

f) -32768

Positive: 32768 = 1000 0000 0000 0000
Bit flip: 0111 1111 1111 1111
+1      : 1000 0000 0000 0000

So -32786 = 8000

g) -32767

Positive: 32767 = 0111 1111 1111 1111
Bit flip: 1000 0000 0000 0000
+1      : 1000 0000 0000 0001

So -32767 = 8001

h) -128

Positive: 128 = 0000 0000 1000 0000
Bit flip: 1111 1111 0111 1111
+1      : 1111 1111 1000 0000

So -128 = ff80
